instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board no Bluetooth, keyboard and trackpad , external works
threads.message:
this board <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> had water damage , cleaned  now working good but No keyboard or trackpad or BLUETOOTH !!!

external usb mouse keyboard works , any idea where can i start!!! 

when trackpad connected there is 18v on <DIODE>D5802</DIODE>

ALSO IT TURNS ON WITH POWER BUTTON, only power button works

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board no Bluetooth, keyboard and trackpad , external works
threads.message:
According with schematic, Bluetooth, TP/KB and IR devices are connected to PCH through an USB HUB; <CHIP>U2700</CHIP> on page 25.
Check its area for corrosion, rebuild traces if needed, change resistors...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board no Bluetooth, keyboard and trackpad , external works
threads.message: no luck , everything looks ok, what to do what to do [USER="1"]larossmann[/USER]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board no Bluetooth, keyboard and trackpad , external works
threads.message:
Looks OK, or measured OK?
Did you check traces continuity?
Also check and compare diode mode to ground for all data lines.
All power pins good for <CHIP>U2700</CHIP>?
Corect oscillation at Y2700?
<SIGNAL>USB_HUB_RESET_L</SIGNAL> OK?
